title: Assault on 2 tribal men in Gujarat’s Narmada leaves 1 dead, 1 critical; 6 held
selftext: 2 Tribal men killed on the pretext of theft and entering the new under-construction Tibal Museum in Narmada Gujarat. The one in critical condition died Today.
